section.name: DBUnit
section.p: DbUnit is a JUnit extension (also usable from Ant) targeted for database-driven projects that, among other things, puts your database into a known state between test runs. This is an excellent way to avoid the myriad of problems that can occur when one test case corrupts the database and causes subsequent tests to fail or exacerbate the damage.

DbUnit has the ability to export and import your database (or specified tables) content to and from XML datasets. This is targeted for functional testing, so this is not the perfect tool to backup a huge production database.
DbUnit also provides assert facility to verify that your database content match some expected values.
